metadata.title: Spark901 | Code for Good. Powered in Memphis.
metadata.description: Open-source software infrastructure that helps nonprofits and community organizations scale their impact—faster, cheaper, and sustainably.

hero.tagline: Code for Good. Powered in Memphis.
hero.headline: Fund the tools that power nonprofits
hero.description: Your contribution builds permanent, open-source infrastructure that helps hundreds of organizations do more good—forever.
hero.socialProof: {count}+ people have already joined the movement

impact.title: One tool. Hundreds of nonprofits. Unlimited impact.
impact.description: Traditional donations help one org once. Tech funding creates infrastructure that scales across hundreds of organizations—forever. That's compounding impact.

step1.title: Pick Your Project
step1.description: Browse our catalog of plain-English project descriptions. No tech jargon, just clear impact.

step2.title: Fund the Build
step2.description: Contribute any amount—one-time or monthly. 100% goes to development. No overhead fees.

step3.title: Watch It Multiply
step3.description: Your investment powers tools that serve hundreds of organizations. Track your impact in real-time.

cta.title: You don't need to code to build technology that changes lives.
cta.subtitle: Join {count}+ supporters funding the future of nonprofit tech.

fundATool.title: Fund a Tool
fundATool.description: Choose a project that resonates with you. Every dollar builds permanent infrastructure for social good.

whyFund.title: Why Fund Open-Source Tech?
whyFund.subtitle: The smartest investment you can make in social good.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Nonprofits waste 40% of their budget on outdated, overpriced software. They deserve better.

solution.title: The Spark901 Solution
solution.description: We build free, open-source tools designed specifically for social impact organizations. Fund once, help forever.

compounding.title: The Compounding Effect
compounding.description: Unlike traditional donations that get spent once, tech funding creates permanent infrastructure. Every dollar keeps working—forever.

comparison.traditionalDesc: $1,000 helps one org for one program

about.title: About Spark901
about.mission: We're a for-good software studio rooted in Memphis. We believe technology should multiply impact, not drain budgets.

values.title: What We Stand For
values.openSourceDesc: Every line of code is public. When you fund our work, the whole sector benefits.
values.communityDesc: We're professional engineers funded by people who believe in better nonprofit tech.
values.memphisDesc: Born in the 901, building technology that honors our city's legacy of community power.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.subtitle: See exactly where every dollar goes.
transparency.fundsDescription: 100% of contributions fund tools. Here's the breakdown:
transparency.openSourceNote: All code is public on GitHub. Audit us anytime.
transparency.legalNote: Spark901 is an LLC, not a 501(c)(3). Contributions are not tax-deductible but do fund permanent public infrastructure.
